name: Prem Thakkar
summary: Data Science graduate with a strong Computer Science foundation, skilled in machine learning, statistical modeling, and data engineering. Experienced in Python, SQL, and cloud platforms, delivering scalable, data-driven solutions through predictive modeling and pipeline optimization.

education.degree: Master of Science in Data Science

education.institution: Shiv Nadar Institute of Eminence, Greater Noida, India

experience.title: Artificial Intelligence Intern
responsibilities: Fine-tuned Meta's LLaMA 4 model to build a domain-specific chatbot for the company website, improving automated support and user interaction using advanced prompt engineering and model optimization.
Built an interactive dashboard using Lovable AI, integrated with a custom REST API connected to a Microsoft Azure SQL Database, enabling real-time data visualization and business insights.

experience.title: Backend Developer Intern
responsibilities: Developed a gas sensor integrated with IoT technology, capable of detecting CO, CO2, PM1.0, PM2.5, PM10.0, humidity, and temperature, and transmitting the data wirelessly.
Implemented backend code using APIs to send the collected sensor data to an online database, where it is sorted and displayed on a user-specific website for easy access and monitoring.

projects.name: Car Damage Detection
details: Collected the car images and annotated them using ROBOFLOW.
Trained using YOLO v11 on 600 epochs.
Best model achieved 90.8% precision and 85.3% recall.

projects.name: InstaBuild: AI MicroWebApp Builder
details: Used Gemini API to generate source code for web applications.
Model was trained specifically for React-based applications.
The generated code was locally hosted for user preview and editing.

projects.name: MÜSICA: AI Music Generator
details: Beats generated with MusicGen; lyrics with ChatGPT API.
Synced lyrics and beats using Whisper with fine-tuning on Kaggle datasets.

projects.name: Sentiment Analysis: Amazon Product Reviews
details: Web-scraped live product review data from URLs.
Stored data in JSON format, analyzed sentiment scores (-1 to 1).
Computed average sentiment score to rate products.

honorsActivities.title: HACKNJIT Winner
honorsActivities.description: Won the hackathon with InstaBuild web app project.
